Class XFVRPSavingsLamda

java.lang.Object
  de.fhg.iml.vlog.xfvrp.base.XFVRPBase<XFVRPModel>
      de.fhg.iml.vlog.xfvrp.opt.XFVRPOptBase
          de.fhg.iml.vlog.xfvrp.opt.construct.XFVRPSavings
              de.fhg.iml.vlog.xfvrp.opt.construct.XFVRPSavingsLamda

public class XFVRPSavingsLamda
extends XFVRPSavings

Contains the Savings optimization procedure, where the acceptance criteria is parameterized by the lamda value. Six variants with different lamda values (0.6, 1, 1.4, 1.6, 2, 3) are calculated and best result is taken.

Author:
hschneid
